title: Resisters
description:
Caitlin Gill, Sian Mason and Eddie Hejka share stories about refusing to stay silent about justice.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Sian Mason, Maybeshewill, Madcon, Eddie Hejka, WatchCut, Orgone, The Staple Singers, Caitlin Gill, Kevin Allison)
